author: ammulder
msg: Implement the revised assembler interface by returning a null deployer,
which is to say, deploying at runtime is not supported per se.

author: ammulder
msg: Add a deployer interface.  The deployer is provided by the assembler,
since the two will often share functionality and work closely together.

author: ammulder
msg: Handle ClassLoaders as well as JARs.
Let the caller specify a client JAR name.

author: ammulder
msg: A class that reads an EJB JAR and its mainfest Class-Path entries and
extracts all the classes needed to support the home/component
interfaces of the EJBs.  This can be used, for example, to prepare
a JAR to load on the Tomcat classpath while the rest of the EJB JAR
is loaded in a child ClassLoader.

author: sourceforge-tim273
msg: Added the start of CMP mapping
